english.promotionaltext: Green plant which looks beautiful on a patio
english.description: Green plant which can withstand low temperatures (minimum -10 C).
english.specifications: Plant which can grow up to 30 cm.
english.caretips: Water plant only once every two weeks.
english.aboutgrower: This grower only used organic pesticides.
